text: Bartosz Grabowski (born 11 April 2000) is a Polish sprint canoeist.Profile Vice world champion in 2017 at k4 500m (with P.Korsak, W.Tracz and F.Weckwert) He was European and world champion in 2018 (K1 200m). He had got bronze medal in k1 200m U23 in Piesti world championship. He won a medal at the 2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships.2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships results ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in kayak Category:Polish male canoeists
title: Bartosz Grabowski
